data.name: vkfix for vk.com (new.vk.com)
data.description:
Complete re-design of new.vk.com style
Полный редизайн нового стиля вконтача - new.vk.com.
Проработаны динамические размеры по ширине. Почищены лишние пробелы. Убраны круглые рамки у фотографий аватарок.

data.name: PlayCanvas IDE (Fira Code font)
bilibili美化与精简
data.description: 哔哩哔哩美化脚本 ⏩因为B站主页更新，请大家将自定义选项里的分区屏蔽中的block改成flex（如果仍未block的话），否则页面会很奇怪！想要屏蔽的话依旧可以写none ⏩背景图片三个覆盖模式：cover：图片完全覆盖背景，图片和背景长宽比不能差太大；contain：尽量拉伸图片使得图片能完全看见，不会完全覆盖背景；XX%：百分比缩放图片。 ======== 主要功能： ✅改变了网页版B站的风格。 ✅本样式可以高度地自定义，打造属于你自己的风格。 ✅屏蔽了大部分可见广告，小部分的广告换成了插画。 ✅屏蔽了直播间的大部分无关信息，清爽的观看体验。 ✅全屏观看优化，不再因为碰一下鼠标就显示控制栏影响观感。 ✅大部分内容半透明（方便看老婆）。 ✅去掉了页面底端、APP下载等无关内容，可以自定义。 ✅主页分区屏蔽，在样式自定义里面设置。 ======== 食用须知： 🅿本插件随缘更新，如果你遇到了问题，可以留言告诉我。 🅿直播间去污代码在代码2，直播间去污代码在代码2。 🅿仍然有部分页面没做完，或因网站更新而失效。（本人学生，此前没学过CSS） ======== 🌐灵感及部分代码来源：百度美化G36 🌐我的另一个作品，百度去广告（兼容性其他样式） 🌐爱发电（我还没有陷入财务危机，请不必担心） 🌐邮件地址961857877@qq.com，欢迎指出问题和尬聊

data.name: 梓喵 动漫花园 2019
data.description: 让你的动漫花园比较现代化

data.name: BLACK STYLE hdrezka.ag
data.description:
Дорогие пользователи, прошу пишите мне на этом сайте в feedback или куда-нибудь в лс, если видите в этом стиле ошибки, недокрашенные области и пр. Мне самой сложно следить за всем, помогайте. Дата последних изменений в стиле находится выше в графе Last Updated, иными словами, если вы видите что дата там изменилась значит стиль был немного доработан.

Изменения: плеер выше :D

data.name: Notabenoid.org Dark Style v.2.0

This style based on xob0t's Dark Style for Notabenoid.org.
I just corrected some css code fore better styling.

Стиль основан на Dark Style для Notabenoid.org от xob0t.
Я лишь откорректировал некоторые элементы и улучшил стиль.

data.name: zyBooks Dark
data.description: A dark theme for zyBooks for late-night studying.
data.css:
@-moz-document domain("learn.zybooks.com") {
.route-container,
body {
  background-color: #363636;
}

*:focus {
  outline-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
}

.toolbar,
.top-toolbar,
.zb-modal-banner {
  background-color: #222;
}

.bread-crumbs a {
  color: #E5E5E5;
  max-width: 100%;
  transition: background-color .25s ease-out, color .25s ease-out;
}

table.development-environment div.storage-container,
h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6 {
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

blockquote {
  background-color: #333;
  border-left: 10px solid #f57c00;
}

blockquote::before {
  color: #f57c00;
}

.zb-checkbox.grey.label-present {
  color: #37474f;
}

.not-found-page .section-nav,
.section-preview-modal .section-nav,
.zybook-chapter-print-page .section-nav,

.zb-card {

.not-found-page .zb-nav-menu,
.zybook-chapter-add-lab-page .zb-nav-menu,

  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.zb-menu .rl-dropdown {
  background-color: #222;
}

.zb-menu .rl-dropdown a,
.zb-menu .rl-dropdown button {
  background-color: #222;
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.zb-menu .rl-dropdown-toggle {
  background-color: #222;
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.interactive-activity-container,
.resource-container,
.static-container {
  background-color: #333;
  border: 1px solid #333;
}

.zb-modal .zb-modal-content {
  background-color: #333;
}

.interactive-activity-container .activity-title-bar {
  background-color: #464646;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #464646;
}

.interactive-activity-container .activity-description,
.interactive-activity-container .activity-type {
  background-color: #464646;
}

.static-container h6 {
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.static-container.aside-bordered .container-resource-payload {
  border-bottom: 3px solid #E5E5E5;
  border-top: 6px solid #E5E5E5;
}

.markdown-content-resource table,
.test-question .table > table,
.test-question .zytable,
.zybook-section .table > table,
.zybook-section .zytable,
.markdown-content-resource table[style],
.test-question .table > table[style],
.test-question .zytable[style],
.zybook-section .table > table[style],
.zybook-section .zytable[style] {
  background: #222 !important;
  border: 2px solid #999 !important;
}

.markdown-content-resource table th,
.test-question .table > table th,
.test-question .zytable th,
.zybook-section .table > table th,
.zybook-section .zytable th,
.markdown-content-resource table tr[style],
.test-question .table > table tr[style],
.test-question .zytable tr[style],
.zybook-section .table > table tr[style],
.zybook-section .zytable tr[style] {
  background-color: #464646 !important;
  border: 1px solid #999 !important;
}

.markdown-content-resource table td,
.table-column-style,
.test-question .table > table td,
.test-question .zytable td,
.zybook-section .table > table td,
.zybook-section .zytable td {
  border: 1px solid #999;
}

.test-question .term,
.zybook-section .term,
.zybook-section a.term {
  color: #f57c00;
}

.material-icons.grey {
  color: #999;
}

.test-question .code,
.test-question .zyblock,
.test-question div.code,
.zybook-section .code,
.zybook-section .zyblock,
.zybook-section div.code {
  background-color: #464646;
}

.definition-match-payload .definition-row .term-bucket {
  background-color: #292929;
}

.definition-match-payload .definition-row .definition {
  background-color: #464646;
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.definition-match-payload .definition-row .definition-drag-container.hover .term-bucket {
  background-color: #464646;
}

.definition-match-payload .definition-row .definition-drag-container.hover .definition {
  background-color: #666;
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.not-found-page .hidden-content-container .bar,
.section-preview-modal .hidden-content-container .bar,
.zybook-chapter-print-page .hidden-content-container .bar,
.zybook-chapter-section-loading-page .bar,
.zybook-chapter-section-page .hidden-content-container .bar,
.zybook-error-page .bar,
.zybook-error-page .hidden-content-container .bar,
.zylab-ui-page .hidden-content-container .bar,
.not-found-page .hidden-content-container .thin-box,
.section-preview-modal .hidden-content-container .thin-box,
.zybook-chapter-print-page .hidden-content-container .thin-box,
.zybook-chapter-section-loading-page .thin-box,
.zybook-chapter-section-page .hidden-content-container .thin-box,
.zybook-error-page .hidden-content-container .thin-box,
.zybook-error-page .thin-box,
.zylab-ui-page .hidden-content-container .thin-box {
  opacity: .5;
}

.not-found-page .hidden-content-container .box,
.section-preview-modal .hidden-content-container .box,
.zybook-chapter-print-page .hidden-content-container .box,
.zybook-chapter-section-loading-page .box,
.zybook-chapter-section-page .hidden-content-container .box,
.zybook-error-page .box,
.zybook-error-page .hidden-content-container .box,
.zylab-ui-page .hidden-content-container .box {
  border: 8px solid rgba(245, 124, 0, .5);
}

.zb-input-container input {
  border-bottom: 1px solid #b0bec5;
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.zb-input-container input::placeholder {
  color: #666 !important;
}

.search-input .search-suggestions {
  background-color: #292929;
}

.search-input .search-suggestions li.hover,
.search-input .search-suggestions li:hover {
  background-color: #333;
}

.search-input .search-suggestions a {
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.section-item .section-title-link .section-info .section-title-info .section-title {
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.section-expand-button .no-activities {
  color: #999;
}

.table-of-contents h3,
.table-of-contents a:active,
.table-of-contents a:link,
.table-of-contents a:visited {
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.table-of-contents .toc-header,
.table-of-contents .toc-header-common {
  background-color: #222;
  border: 1px solid #666;
}

.table-of-contents .table-of-contents-list.header-absent .chapter-item:first-of-type .toc-header-common,
.table-of-contents .zb-divider {
  border-top: 1px solid #666;
}

.chapter-item .section-list-container {
  background-color: #222;
  border-left: 1px solid #666;
  border-right: 1px solid #666;
}

.table-of-contents .zb-divider {
  border-top: 1px solid #666;
}

.about-page-modal h3,
.lab-statistics-charts .chart-container .chart-label,
.section-header {
  color: #999;
}

.zybook-panel {
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.zybook-panel .tabs .full-tab:not(:last-child) {
  border-right: 1px solid #666;
}

.zybook-panel .tabs .full-tab.active {
  background-color: #222;
  color: #E5E5E5;
  border-bottom: 4px solid rgb(245, 124, 0);
}

.zybook-panel .tabs .full-tab.inactive {
  background-color: #333;
  color: gray;
  border-top: 1px solid #666;
}

.library-page .zybooks-section-header {
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.zb-footer ul li a {
  color: #999;
}

.zb-progress-circular.xl.message-below.message-present {
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.section-announcement .message-buttons-container,
.section-announcement .message-buttons-container .message-title-container .message {
  color: #999;
}

.date-time-picker input,
.date-time-picker .ember-basic-dropdown,
.ember-basic-dropdown,
.ember-basic-dropdown-content,
.ember-basic-dropdown-content * {
  color: initial;
}

.test-question pre,
.zybook-section pre {
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.animation-code-object pre {
  color: #000;
}

.detect-answer-question button {
  background-color: #37474f;
}

div.question-area {
  background-color: white;
}

.arrangeInst .code-box,
div.programming-code-output {
  background-color: #222;
  border: 1px solid #666;
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.arrangeInst .monitor-screen {
  background-color: #222;
}

.arrangeInst .sortable-list .sortable span {
  background-color: #f9d8bc;
  border: 2px dashed #37474f;
  color: #37474f;
}

.test-question .code pre,
.test-question div.code,
.zybook-section .code pre,
.zybook-section div.code pre {
  color: #000;
}

.test-question .code,
.test-question div.code,
.zybook-section .code,
.zybook-section div.code {
  background-color: #E5E5E5;
  color: #000;
}

.test-result .test-header .test-title-container {
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.test-question .console,
.zybook-section .console {
  background: #222;
  border: 1px solid #666;
}

.busVariable .memory-block .memory-address {
  color: #37474f;
}

.string-diff-highlight {
  color: #37474f;
}

.HYPE_scene pre,
.HYPE_scene xmp,
.HYPE_scene plaintext,
.HYPE_scene listing {
  color: #000;
}

.zb-simple-expandable .title,
.material-icons.blue-grey {
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.zyimage,
.animation-canvas {
  background-color: white;
  opacity: 0.85;
}

.vizLayoutTd #codeDisplayDiv #legendDiv,
.vizLayoutTd #dataViz #stackHeader,
.vizLayoutTd #dataViz #heapHeader {
  color: #E5E5E5;
}

.vizLayoutTd .typeLabel {
  color: #999 !important;
}

.vizLayoutTd #dataViz .stackFrame,
.vizLayoutTd #dataViz .heapObject {
  color: #37474f;
}
}
